name: Scrollbar
author: themepoints

sections.description:
Scrollbar wp is fully customizable WordPress scrollbar plugin. You can change scrollbar color, border radius, scroll speed, width, border style & other settings using plugin option page.

Scrollbar by https://themepoints.com

  • Live demo!»

Plugin Features

  • Simple installation & activation
  • Unlimited colors.
  • CSS3 animation.
  • Supported touch devices.
  • All browser supported
  • Custom Width.
  • Scrollbar border radius.
  • Scrollbar scroll speed.
  • Scrollbar border.
  • Auto Hide Mode Enable/Disable.
  • Lightweight.
  • Easy Option Panel.
  • Easy Documentation.
sections.installation:
1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your Pluings setting via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. After activate plugin you will see “Scrollbar Wp” menu at left side on WordPress dashboard and find “Scrollbar Option Settings”
